value: Congregation: An orgy of pleasure (sex, food, dance, music).
Congregation: Sacred hymns or prayers for days without ceasing.
Congregation: Occupying a sacred nexus point during an astrological confluence.
Congregation: A pilgrimage to a sacred place or being in the deathlands.
Congregation: A pilgrimage to a sacred place or being in the sea.
Congregation: A group vision / dream-quest via essences, drugs or meditation.
Congregation: A reenactment of a sacred event.
